name: Russian road
description:
There is a post office on one of the Russian roads in Siberia, but due to lack of funding, it turned out to be abandoned. However, 25-year-old Jeri didn't care until he lost control of his car and crashed into stones that fell on the road. Now he will need to repair his car and, preferably, refuel it with gas in order to continue his journey through the Russian forests. Be careful when looking for tools.

Tools in the hermit house, stay away from him

Good luck with the game
